**Citation**
For the underlying tool, please cite the following two publications:
SnpSift citation: "Using Drosophila melanogaster as a model for genotoxic chemical mutational studies with a new program, SnpSift", Cingolani, P., et. al., Frontiers in Genetics, 3:35, 2012.
